At Bangkok Eatery our goal is to provide you a faster of traditonal and authentic Halal,Indian food that will keep you coming back for more .We take pride in offering a diverse set of dishes delivered to your home or office.There are plenty of specials available for delivery or collection that will satisfy your hunger.Let Bangkok Eatery help you make your next night in the best possible. 

Order your take away ,track your orders,earn loyality points and benefit from greate offers and discounts just order here.Don't forget to let us know if you enjoyed your meal by leaving feedback.Bon appetite!
